shoppingCart.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • shoppingCart.model.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    A class that manages Product state. Subject in Observer Pattern
    Author:
    Newman Souza, Seth Moore
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • increment

        public void increment()
        Increments the Product's quantity by 1.
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        quantity > 0

      • decrement

        public void decrement()
        Decrements the Product's quantity by 1.
        Precondition:
        quantity > 0
        Postcondition:
        quantity >= 0

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks for equality between this Product and the obj parameter, and returns the result. Equality is based on ID.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object that is being compared to this Product.
        Returns:
        true if obj and this are equivalent (does not fields other than ID into account), otherwise false

      • removeListeners

        public void removeListeners()
        Removes all the ChangeListeners.
        Postcondition:
        no change listeners that had been added to this Product will receive notifications of this Product's state changes.
